summary: A group of friends are stalked and murdered whilst looking for psilocybin mushrooms in the Irish woods.
cast: Lindsey Haun|Jack Huston|Max Kasch|Maya Hazen|Alice Greczyn|Robert Hoffman|Don Wycherley|Sean McGinley|Toby Sedgwick|André Pollack|Jack Gleeson|Mike Carbery|Anna Tikhonova|Goranna McDonald|Berry Murphy|Joe Murphy|Joe Phelan|Stuart Rankin
title: Cabeza de muerte
